root.name: True Lies
root.description: OverviewTrue Lies is a game based on the film of the same name, which starred the now Govenator of California, Arnold Schwarzenegger. The game takes place from a top-down perspective and follows the plot of the film, you just ended up killing more people. True Lies featuredÂ a penalty for civilian casualties, as well as the ability to roll under bullets. True Lies got progressively more difficult as you progressed through the game and featured a password system.PlotYou play as Harry Tasker, a secret agent, who is pursuing group of terrorists led by Salim Abu Aziz. While chasing after the terrorists, Aziz takes takes his daughter hostage. You're tasked with taking down this terrorist orginization, as well as saving your daughter.
